rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space leading into the home.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious living area with access to the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen for ease of serving food.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with modern appliances and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom with its own spacious balcony.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Open central courtyard for natural light and ventilation, serving as a focal point of the design.

openings.description: Separate openings connecting each bedroom to its balcony for improved natural ventilation.
Large French windows enhancing natural light flow from the courtyard.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a large balcony providing morning sunlight.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary master bedroom with its own balcony and Vastu-aligned positioning for harmony.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Dedicated space for work or study, placed near natural light.

openings.description: Separate doors from each bedroom to its respective balcony ensuring privacy and optimal ventilation.
Modern staircase connecting ground floor to first floor, designed with safety and aesthetics in mind.
